Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: an is there any reason the nSPV client cannot just receive the real mempool? rather than needing to request it from full nodes?

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: It connected to them already and they would just send mempool out to nSPV nodes the same as any other?

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: currently libnspv needs to wait for confirmations to get to a known state, has no concept of mempool when creating tx

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: it only needs to implement a mempool to have a real mempool

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: great... seem to me that would be the proper way to do it

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: yes

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: then all the mempool requests can query the local mempool

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: worried about overall network bandwidth though
